name: Troy Ross
text: 8 to 5pm hours. 30 minute unloaded 53" all bulk wood.

name: Jason Crowell
text: Fantastic people, with a great product and service they provide for the public. Very friendly and just good people.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words- and we appreciate you as well.

name: Victoria Salinas
text: David was super helpful when we went to Avondale Hardwoods last week!! He helped us pick out the perfect wood for our table. He even went over the project details with us, to make sure we had everything we needed. Will definitely be coming back to the shop for future wood purchases. Thanks!! 🤩🤩

name: Christopher Peek
text: Don't buy the garbage overpriced lumber at home depot. Come here and get quality stuff at a good price. David is super friendly and can answer any woodworking question you can dream up.

name: Katie Gilreath
text: David was super helpful when I went into Avondale Hardwoods. He was very knowledgeable and helped me with my project questions. He also has a great selection of woods for an affordable price! I highly recommend.

name: Mave Ellen Duke
text: Avondale Hardwoods definitely has THE best selection of hardwoods and prices in Birmingham. Also, the customer service that we received from David was very much appreciated. We really weren’t sure exactly what we were looking for, but he aswered all our questions and helped us find the perfect hardwood for our home renovation. We will definitely be using Avondale Hardwoods in the future.

name: Julia Biddy
text: I feel like my husband has been to every lumber business in the area, all to no avail. Prices and knowledge were LACKING everywhere we went. Avondale Hardwoods delivered big time, and we couldn’t have been more pleased with David Traylor. He was nice, competent, affordable, and did beautiful work on our dining room table. I won’t be going anywhere else in the future.

name: Whitney Smith
text: David Traylor is the best in the biz! His expertise and wood selection is top notch. My go-to wood shop for family, friends, and clients alike.

name: stephanie sylvester
text: The selection at Avondale Hardwoods is the best in Birmingham and the prices cannot be beat! Dave is very helpful and knowledgeable and answered all my questions about my project!

name: Taylor King
text: David was super helpful when I went to AH. He was very knowledgeable and helped with all my project questions. Highly recommend!!

name: Dana Dsuggs
text: David is incredible. He has some of the best wood around and all of it at exceptionally reasonable prices. Cant reccomend him and avondale hardwoods enough.

name: B A Buckland
text: Outstanding selection of domestic and exotic woods. David always has time to talk about projects. I'll be back soon.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review! Hope to see you again very soon.

name: Lauren Allen
text: Avondale Hardwoods is hands down the best ! David’s expertise along with their friendly prices and gorgeous, unique product is why I only use AH! David  made my vision come to life and the result exceeded any expectations I had!

name: Scott Hames
text: This place is a hidden gem! Do yourself a favor and swing through for all your lumber needs! David is great and extremely knowledgeable!
